column1: The Purple Pig////I ordered the crispy pork ear
column4: and chicken skewers. Cooked very well - the meat was so tender I could pick it off easily with a fork
column5: and the sauce and veggies that accompanied it had strong tastes but didn't overwhelm the main part of the dish. The crispy pork ear was alright - I personally believe it was too fried
column6: which made it honestly taste like nothing more than fancy potato chips. Maybe that's your thing
column7: but especially compared to the flavors of the pork shoulder and the chicken skewers
column8: it was nothing to write home about.
